basics.addContextDesc: Use @ to specify files for context (e.g., @src/myFile.ts) to target specific files or folders.
basics.shellModeDesc: Execute shell commands via ! (e.g., !npm run start) or use natural language (e.g. start server).

shortcuts.altLeftRight: Alt+Left/Right - Jump through words in the input
shortcuts.ctrlJLinux: {{key}} - New line (Alt+Enter works for certain linux distros)
shortcuts.upDown: Up/Down - Cycle through your prompt history

fullShortcutsDocs: For a full list of shortcuts, see {{docsPath}}

stats.cacheEfficiencyMessage: Cache efficiency: {{efficiency}}% ({{hits}} hits out of {{total}} requests)
